apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple with heart emoji showcases a loving embrace between a woman with medium-light skin tone and another with dark skin tone, unified by a vibrant red heart.  Apple's distinct glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges bring a tangible warmth and depth to their forms, while realistic lighting highlights their connection. It beautifully symbolizes diverse relationships, partnership, and deep affection, perfect for celebrating love and unity in your messages.
